description: A mysterious warrior from Natlan, Ororon wields a polearm and commands the power of Electro to strike down foes. (Speculative/Community Build)

artifacts.name: Emblem of Severed Fate (2) + Thundering Fury (2)

info: Ororon is a speculative Electro polearm DPS from Natlan. Build for CRIT, ATK%, and Electro DMG Bonus. (Community/Placeholder)

skills.name: Normal Attack: Thunderous Spear
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 consecutive polearm strikes imbued with Electro.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive polearm strikes imbued with Electro.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to lunge forward, dealing Electro DMG to opponents along the way.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE Electro DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Storm Surge
skills.desc: Ororon calls down a surge of lightning, dealing AoE Electro DMG and increasing his ATK for a short duration.
skills.details_html:
Storm Surge
Calls down a surge of lightning, dealing AoE Electro DMG and increasing ATK for a short duration.

skills.name: Judgment of the Skies
skills.desc: Ororon unleashes a powerful Electro strike from above, dealing massive AoE Electro DMG and granting all party members increased Energy Recharge.
skills.details_html:
Judgment of the Skies
Unleashes a powerful Electro strike from above, dealing massive AoE Electro DMG and granting all party members increased Energy Recharge.

passive_talents.name: Lightning's Precision
passive_talents.desc: After using Storm Surge, Ororon's CRIT Rate is increased by 15% for 10s. (Placeholder)

passive_talents.name: Thunder's Endurance
passive_talents.desc: Judgment of the Skies increases all party members' ATK by 10% for 10s. (Placeholder)

passive_talents.name: Natlan's Swiftness
passive_talents.desc: Decreases sprinting stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%. (Placeholder)

constellations.name: Thunder's Call
constellations.desc: Storm Surge grants a shield that absorbs damage equal to 10% of Ororon's Max HP for 6s. (Placeholder)

constellations.name: Lightning's Fury
constellations.desc: Judgment of the Skies increases Electro DMG Bonus by 15% for 10s. (Placeholder)

constellations.name: Storm's Edge
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Storm Surge by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15. (Placeholder)

constellations.name: Sky's Wrath
constellations.desc: When Ororon's HP falls below 50%, his ATK is increased by 20% for 10s. (Placeholder)

constellations.name: Thunderous Majesty
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Judgment of the Skies by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15. (Placeholder)

constellations.name: Lightning Unleashed
constellations.desc: After using Judgment of the Skies, Ororon's Normal Attacks deal an additional 30% Electro DMG for 10s. (Placeholder)
